alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Arthur, southwestern Cherry, Grant, western Hooker and northwestern McPherson Counties through 315 PM CDT/215 PM MDT/... At 215 PM CDT/115 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with gusty winds extending from 13 miles northwest of Whitman to 13 miles south of Hyannis. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hyannis, Swan Lake, Whitman, Carr Lake, Duluth, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Cogill Lake, Calora, East Cody Lake, Green Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Hire, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Three Mile Lake, Pratt Lake, Spring Valley Lake and Hecla. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 144 and 183. Highway 61 between mile markers 133 and 176. Highway 92 between mile markers 176 and 186. Highway 97 between mile markers 71 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building.
